title: How to Make Nacho Cheese Sauce Pasta

steps.headline: Bring salted water to a boil.
Add elbow macaroni and cook until just tender.
Add remaining ingredients to a large mixing bowl and mix well.
Spray a large casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Pour pasta mixture into prepared casserole dish.

text: Bring salted water to a boil.  Add elbow macaroni and cook until just tender. Drain. Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Add remaining ingredients to a large mixing bowl and mix well.  Stir in macaroni.  Spray a large casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray.  Pour pasta mixture into prepared casserole dish.  Bake 45 to 50 minutes until golden.  Finished.
sentences: Bring salted water to a boil.
Add elbow macaroni and cook until just tender.
Add remaining ingredients to a large mixing bowl and mix well.
Spray a large casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Pour pasta mixture into prepared casserole dish.
